website_summaries.verdict: A versatile, well-made shoe that falls at the lower end of the Nike price spectrum – the best deal available.
pros: Versatile for numerous purposes, such as walking, training, working out and more
Sports flex-groove construction that moves with your feet and Pylon cushioning for soft, lightweight support
cons: Runs on the narrow side, and the arch support is lacking compared to other models, especially if your feet have high arches

customer_reviews.title: it is comfortable. They still look brand new so I get ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these for me last year for Christmas. I wear a 10.5 and he got me 11. It's a little snug. I wear them several times a week. Once I forget they are snug, it is comfortable. They still look brand new so I get compliments on them almost weekly. My daughter loves to steal them from me and she swears they are super comfortable. She wears a 10.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet, happy buy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely happy with these shoes. I've been wearing them now for 2 weeks straight to break them in by going to work, gym, errand runs, etc. My feet are comfortable and happy, I was a little worried at first about there not being enough sole thickness but it's actually just right. The shoes are light and perfect for any time of the day and so far are pretty easy to clean too. I definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe but a Tad Small
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of these shoes but the size I normally wear was tight. The shoe seemed narrow although I don't have a wide foot. Not sure if I should go up a half size or get a wide in my size.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are narrow. (I do not wear a narrow shoe.) Arch support is uneven - right vs left foot. Heel tab is too high. Cannot wear these with no show socks as they chafe. Not an all day shoe.... I have only worn them twice...
customer_reviews.author: va

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Zumba Shoe
customer_reviews.text: True size. Very comfortable. I use them for Zumba and my feet are comfortable. No sliding when doing quick turns or slippage. I'm so glad I bought these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: maria navarro

customer_reviews.title: Great for pivoting and direction changes as well as short sprints
customer_reviews.text: I have an older pair of these shoes. Work great for kickboxing and circuit training. The back does rub on the Achilles tendon a bit when the shoe is new.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: These are a nice, simple black shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice, simple black shoe. Clean and modern enough to look cute with jeans or yoga pants. Fits well and comfortable enough to run around with the kids all day.
customer_reviews.author: kt

customer_reviews.title: Repeat user!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is on her third pair of these shoes. She marched with a drum corps for the past two summers and used these shoes for her daily workout (12+ hours per day). Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amy T

customer_reviews.title: I love them, they're cute
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7 1/2 but in nike I always order an 8. These however seem a tad bigger. I love them, they're cute. I sometimes trip over my own feet because they're a tad bigger than I need.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I found that I have no problems with them. Black is a good neutral color, and I wear them with everything. I will reorder when I need a new pair, but I have worn these for a year (they got me around Europe during my study abroad walking 10+ miles most days) and still find they are in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: A bit wide in the toe
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, but they aren't what I'm looking for. I have a somewhat narrow foot. When I workout, I run for 30 min and then do weights and HIT. These shoes seem to run a bit wide and my foot moves around too much unless I tighten the laces really tight. It has a more rounded toe and a flat sole. I like the Nike Zoom Fly 2. Those fit my foot the best. I've returned these and bought the zoom fly 2.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Fortin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are very light and comfortable. Men and women compliment me on them. The only draw back was that i got blisters on the back of my ankles from breaking them in, but after a day or so of wear they were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Braniff

customer_reviews.title: I like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes, I wear them for an 8-hour shift, BUT, I wish they were wider. I put "fit as expected" because I tend to have wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: PMTimo

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, awesome fit!
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with the fit and style of this shoe, it hugs my foot just right and it isn't bulky. They are noticeably light and great for walking, lifting weights, running, or working on your feet all day. I would post a picture but I'm not sure how. They were in perfect condition upon a rival!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: This is not the most comfortable running shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is not the most comfortable running shoes that I have used. The size is ok, but I feel the bottom is smaller than my heel. The part with the Nike symbol is too wide. I wouldn't recommend this shoes with you wanna run with them.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Mikilyta Urach de Catro

customer_reviews.title: Great, but..
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes but they are kinda small in size. everything else about it was great but I'd recommend you order a half the size up than what you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: The width fits perfectly, but a little narrow, but that's on the different types on Nike's. Recieved within the time frame it said before I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Brookie

customer_reviews.title: Fits great. Really light
customer_reviews.text: Fits great . Really light . Love the shoelace ! ( polka dots)
customer_reviews.author: Maricar Lotho

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's 2nd pair - she outgrew the first pair. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Longoria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I get many compliments. They are comfortable and lightweight, but provide the support I need!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: They felt small at first but after walking and exercising they are just fine. They are a perfect light weight shoe for ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my usual size because I read so many mixed reviews. They felt small at first but after walking and exercising they are just fine. They are a perfect light weight shoe for bootcamp.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: The flex supreme tr 3 size 10 was what I ...
customer_reviews.text: The flex supreme tr 3 size 10 was what I had prior to purchasing this pair. I ordered a 10 and they were way too small, needed a full size up. Returned and am buying the tr 3s again
customer_reviews.author: Jill Lisinski

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The high arch on the back of the shoe rubs against your heel causing skin irritation and bleeding. The materials are very hard so I am not sure this will get better with more wear.
customer_reviews.author: Sue S

customer_reviews.title: Holy Comfort Batman
customer_reviews.text: Holy Comfort Batman! Very happy with the purchase. Nike seems to fit me better than any other shoe.
customer_reviews.author: The Homesteading Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sneaker. Light weight. Not recommended if you are looking for a supportive sneaker
customer_reviews.author: RJB

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Same Nike quality that I know and love. They never let me down. Love the pink
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Daye

customer_reviews.title: The arch support isn't the greatest but I am mostly happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: They are very cute. It you stand all day add insoles. The arch support isn't the greatest but I am mostly happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cloud💟Guess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design. Loved them. Didnt want to spend 100's of dollars on running shoes, Great Value
customer_reviews.author: Benita Jones

customer_reviews.title: I do not think the arch is as good as my new balance shoes
customer_reviews.text: I lke that this shoe is light weight. I do not think the arch is as good as my new balance shoes!
customer_reviews.author: wilma j

customer_reviews.title: They were so cute, but we're too small. ...
customer_reviews.text: They were so cute, but we're too small. I gave them too my sister she loves them. They are really cute
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, great fit, ready to wear it all day.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Carson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my new shoes. Comfortable and stylish. One thing though, the shoe strings seem like they may break.
customer_reviews.author: Shontae

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe only issue is they are somewhat wide
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe only issue is they are somewhat wide. I have a wide foot so they are ok but if you have a narrow foot these would not be appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: The shoes came in perfect condition, in the box and to my delight ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes came in perfect condition, in the box and to my delight just the right size. I have a small foot so ordering online is always a gamble for me, but I love them. Also incredibly fast shipping my order came in two days earlier than expected so I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Fit as they should
customer_reviews.text: They fit as I thought they should and are very comfortable. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Stiff, uncomfortable, bad arch support. Ok if you have orthotic insoles.
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes, terribly uncomfortable! That said, I have orthotic insoles prescribed from my podiatrist, and so with those, they are much better so I am keeping them. Gave the two stars because they are cute and less expensive than most others. I was very unimpressed with this Nike shoe. Arch support is terrible and they are very stiff. I bought these for when I lift weights/do strength training, since running shoes are not ideal for that.
customer_reviews.author: IssyLady

customer_reviews.title: I wear these a few times a week and love them! I am not a shoe person and ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear these a few times a week and love them! I am not a shoe person and love to be barefoot, these shoes changed that for me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nagle

customer_reviews.title: Kind of small
customer_reviews.text: I like them but seem a bit small. Also left s pretty good blister on my ankle the first time I wore them. Hoping they loosen up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: very little support. kind of flat-footed feeling. but cute for fashion sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly mcbride

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love these tennis shoes, exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good looking good quality shipped and arrived in a timely manner
customer_reviews.author: DailyBoxatFrontDoor64

customer_reviews.title: workout only
customer_reviews.text: good for the gym but not for all day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This may be my favorite pair of Nikes. They fit as expected and go with most colors.
customer_reviews.author: Elia R Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and lightweight but the higher cut on the back gave me blisters on my ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Hutmacher

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and comfortable ( according to my daughter)
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and comfortable ( according to my daughter). Sizes fit as expected, those are her second pairs, and she's happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: kevin lee

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the show is excellent and just what I've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the show is excellent and just what I've been looking for, the product made my walking and jogging experiences enjoyable! I would definitely buy from the same seller again; sellers will work with you if any problem occurs.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: They look exactly how they look in the picture and fit great.
customer_reviews.text: Probably the nicest shoes I've bought from Amazon. They look exactly how they look in the picture and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I actually ordered a half size bigger than normal and still I'd say these 9s feel like 8 1/2
customer_reviews.text: The size seems a tad small, I actually ordered a half size bigger than normal and still I'd say these 9s feel like 8 1/2. The sole is very flat and thin but this may be good for lifting. I'm breaking them in and giving them a chance. Love the design!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I would honestly order these shoes over and over again. They are so comfortable. Breaking in the shoes was very easy and I was able to comfortably wear these shoes to the gym the first day I got them!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfortable. I wear these for 10 - 12 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Wen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoe but I agree with some reviews they do ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe but I agree with some reviews they do wear out quick. Not recommended if you're using these to work out.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy89

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my new black and white Nike Flex Trainer, I wear them for tennis. They are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes yet. I'm thinking of getting another pair. Best fit!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! Perfect for my HIIT workouts. Make sure you get decent training socks.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity Hager

customer_reviews.title: I like this shoe based on color but I prefer Nike ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoe based on color but I prefer Nike running shoes as I think they are more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: at the gym and wear my other NIKE rubber shoes [womens nike downshifter 6] at the opposite every other days which nicely fit and
customer_reviews.text: I keep buying shows coz my feet hurts in different places. This one does not have enough padding to give me comfort all day. I wear this every other day for at least 2.5 hrs. at the gym and wear my other NIKE rubber shoes [womens nike downshifter 6] at the opposite every other days which nicely fit and give me a better comfort. Every year I buy 2 rubber shows as I don't like to wear the same shoes everyday and one of the instructors in my group class advised us to get a new pair per year.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I should know better than to buy shoes on line. I have to wear them to see how they feel. I feel if I wear these around then I can't return them.... Nike is narrow. Now I know and I wouldn't buy another pair. If that isn't a problem for you, then they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great fit! Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I got a 6 and I usually am a 6 in shoes. Def true to size and super cute. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica DiDomenicis

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are fine. Nothing wrong with them, and nothing super special about them. I wear an 8 in most shoes, but an 8.5 in Nike. They did give me blisters because they were cut high on the heel, but would not have been an issue if my socks were higher or my previous shoes had a similar cut.
customer_reviews.author: Jill A.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit. Not bulky
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. Not bulky. Nice cross trainer type shoe. The arch support is fine. Not incredible but normal. Look of the shoe is good. Feels comfortable. Average to narrow at arch and just enough width across toes for good comfort. I wear them also without socks and its been fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits amazing and great!! Love them and wear them 24/7. Will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Alandace G.

customer_reviews.title: Love these! The only new shoes that did not ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! The only new shoes that did not give me blisters after working out. Soft and flexible, but still durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT, just perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are definitely the best Nikes I have purchased or wore! BUY them if you are in of some running or gym shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tabetha

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for affordable black women's walking/running shoes for years. These fit perfect and I have wide feet so there is room for all my toes. Yippy! The mesh top is great to keep my feet from sweating. I just love everything about these Nike's!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth D.

customer_reviews.title: Ended up being smaller than expected. I usually wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Ended up being smaller than expected. I usually wear an 8 in Nike's but they were definitely too small to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Martin

customer_reviews.title: They fit great and are great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for a friend and she loves them! They fit great and are great quality.!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes! Fit like the size you order. The shoes are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Desi Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and a great looking shoe. Highly recommended these!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect! I didn't expect them to come packaged as if I had just picked them up from the store!
customer_reviews.author: Domenae

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, but I am going to have to purchase new shoes and I bought these in January.
customer_reviews.author: LaynaBell14

customer_reviews.title: I have to say these are not as good as my 2 other nike shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have to say these are not as good as my 2 other nike shoes. My 2 others ran around $100 and these cost $60. I wanted a color that would match with everything on my back packing trip. I used them and my feet hurt more than expected but I was walking 5-10 miles a day and found that my Sanuk Women's Yoga Sling 2 Flip Flops were much more comfortable than the nikes. They look great though and I will definitely still use them, but I was expecting them to be a little more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Matt and Amy

customer_reviews.title: High in the heel!
customer_reviews.text: The heels are high and rub. Working on stretching them out.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bohr

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are everything advertised. I injured my right ankle a few months ago and my current sneakers for walking/working out just do not have the right ankle support. I purchased the Nike Flex trainers to aid in both comfort and ankle support for walking and doing yoga. Well, they definitely worked! I would recommend for anyone who has any foot or ankle related injuries.
customer_reviews.author: JD19

customer_reviews.title: Nike Quality is the Best!
customer_reviews.text: I am loyal to the Nike brand. On the advice of a podiatrist friend, I began to wear the "Flex" type of trainers. These are perfect! I have worn a few different pairs of Flex with great success. Best pricing and free shipping always help me make the decision to purchase from Amazon! Very Happy!
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable and have lasted me quite a while with moderate ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, very comfortable and have lasted me quite a while with moderate to heavy every day use.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Newberg

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look good, but they are not comfy in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Xhulia

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Had a tear in the seam before I even took them out of the box. Too much effort to send back and deal with the return. Not very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Kelsey

product_meta.title: Nike Womens Flex Trainer 5 Running Shoe
feature_bullets: Webbed straps work with laces for lockdown
